meanings.definition: Limited in extent, number, scope, or action.
meanings.sent1: The playground had restricted access due to repairs.
meanings.sent2: The restricted area was off-limits to visitors.
meanings.sent3: The cat's restricted diet made it a picky eater.
meanings.sent4: Her restricted budget forced her to be creative with her spending.
meanings.sent5: The restricted airspace was closely monitored by air traffic control.

meanings.sent1: The movie was restricted to viewers above 18 years old.
meanings.sent2: His restricted movements were part of his probation conditions.
meanings.sent3: The restricted access to the chocolate stash led to a family mystery.
meanings.sent4: Her restricted schedule made it challenging to find time for hobbies.
meanings.sent5: The restricted parking lot caused frustration for employees.

meanings.sent1: The bird was restricted to its cage during the party.
meanings.sent2: The restricted river flow caused flooding downstream.
meanings.sent3: The restricted space in the car made the road trip uncomfortable.
meanings.sent4: Her restricted movements on stage were due to a sprained ankle.
meanings.sent5: The restricted opening hours of the store inconvenienced many customers.
